channel.title: blue screen
channel.description:
Hey guys. I have problem with Minecraft. After 15 or so minutes it either crashes and an error pops saying:' ati display driver has stopped responding and has recovered' and when I play Minecraft the second time I get a BSOD. This all started when I downloaded The Witcher 2. The game was lagging like shit so I downloaded the newest drivers. This didn't help at all and all my games started to crash so I removed all drivers with Driver Cleaner and again downloaded the newest drivers. Thankfully the problem was resolved with all of my games except Minecraft. I tried to download some older drivers but to no avail. I also tried removing Minecraft completely and installing it again and this too didn't help. Does someone know what the problem might be?
Specs: - Windows 7 Ultimate 32-bit - ATI Radeon HD 4600 series - AMD Athlon II X4 620 2,6 GHz - 4096 MB RAM DDR3 - Gigabyte GA-MA77OT-UD3P
